HOME_HERO.MOTTO_FIRST_PART: Saint John The Merciful Center for
HOME_HERO.DESCRIPTION: In those moments when you are down, in need of support, how much the help offered with love, from the heart, from belief matters. We fully hope and I firmly believe that the team of Saint John the Merciful Center will strive to bring comfort, healing, and to be a support to those who have no one else to rely on.

DONATION_PROGRESS.TITLE: Progress
DONATION_PROGRESS.DESCRIPTION: The necessary amount to complete the project and the amount raised so far. Every donation counts!

SAINT_JOHN.TITLE: Saint John The Merciful Center
SAINT_JOHN.DESCRIPTION: Together we save lives, change destinies, heal souls. Each of us has gone through a dark period at least once in our life from which we no longer knew how to get out or when it would end. We saw our family, friends, loved ones in our lives suffering and we had no way to help them. How much help is given with empathy, with affection and love. In those moments you need support and I strongly believe that the team of the St. John The Merciful Center will strive to bring relief, healing and be a support to those who will tell us, help us.

FIRST.TITLE: Who are we?
FIRST.DESCRIPTION: We are volunteers who, after several years of humanitarian activities, founded the Bucurie în Dar (Gift of Joy) Association to help on a larger scale. We are people who live for others, not just for ourselves.

SECOND.TITLE: What do we do?
SECOND.DESCRIPTION: We are support with everything in our power, for those who no longer have anyone to support. We strive to prevent the suffering of our loved ones. We are and will be with those who need help, understanding and love.

THIRD.TITLE: What is the mission?
THIRD.DESCRIPTION: Our mission is to bring joy where there is none, in the hearts of as many people as possible, big and small, young and old, together with you.

OUR_TEAM.TITLE: Our Team
OUR_TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Meet our team! We are passionate people when it comes to our work and we wish to bring a positive impact in the world.
